page.title: 10SCHOOLS
page.content:
Willowbrook Primary School stands on a pleasent open site surrounded by fields. It opened in september 1969. It is a semi open plan design. They have avariety of animals like guinea pigs,doves, geese ,bantams and peafowl. The uniform colours are dark green grey and red. It has 166 children and 6 staff and a head master, Mr M Atkinson. The children are aged between 5 and 11. It has 6 classrooms and 8 children go on school bus
KEYWORTH JUNIOR SCHOOL The Junior school was built in two phases in 1964 and 1966.The whole school can take 480 children they can supply 400 meals and the dining room can seat 200 children. the school is staffed by a Headmaster, Mr J.R
